regex.name: makelist
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): import re s = re.findall('<div class="media-body">\s*<a href="([^"]*)(?s).*?rc="([^"]*).*?e;">\s*([^<]*).*?e;">([^<]*)',page_data) return s

regex.name: makelist2
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): from resources.lib.modules import client import xbmc,xbmcgui pDialog = xbmcgui.DialogProgress() pDialog.create('[B][COLOR orchid]THE CREW SPORTS[/COLOR][/B]', 'The Crew Is Loading Your Event Please Wait....') url = client.external('https://ww.hitstreams.live/[makelist.param1]') pDialog.update(65, 'The Crew Is Loading Your Event Please Wait....') pDialog.close() if (pDialog.iscanceled()): return return url

regex.name: makelist
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): from resources.lib.modules import site,control if not control.infoLabel('Container.PluginName') == 'plugin.video.thecrew': return import re,requests page_data = requests.get('https://daddyhd.com/').text page_data = page_data.split('>Cricket<',1)[-1] page_data = page_data.split('>Boxing<',1)[0] e = re.findall('<hr>([^<]*)|href="([^"]*)(?s).*?ner">([^<]*)', page_data) return e

regex.name: makelist2
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): from resources.lib.modules import client url = client.external('https://daddyhd.com[makelist.param2]') return url

dir.title: [COLOR orchid]¤[/COLOR] [COLOR white]CRICKET [/COLOR] [COLOR orchid] LIVE DIRECTS[/COLOR] [COLOR orchid]¤[/COLOR]
